messages.subject: porn, etc.
messages.msgSnippet: ... I talked to him about degradation of women, about creating unhealthy and unreasonable expectations in marriages, and that normal sex wasn t like that. He
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
I talked to him about degradation of women, about
creating unhealthy
and
unreasonable expectations in marriages, and that
normal sex wasn't
like that.
He said "Well, DUH, mom!" I said some people were
messed up by WANTING
it
to be. He seemed surprised that that could happen.

I told him that some of those who are filmed are not
quite volunteers
and
told him two stories, one of the mom of girls his age
he's known his
whole
life,>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

When my son first got Vice City, (he was 9?) from his
Dad, and I saw it, the first scene I saw was a guy,
the hero, walking along the beach, punching out women
in bikinis who kept walking up to him.
I told him the following: many women who might
approach a man in public with the intention of
proposing a trade of sex for money are probably single
moms trying to feed their kids. If you're not
interested, an appropriate response might be no thank
you, not punching them out. (I didn't go into all the
permutations and exceptions) This seemed to work. He
didn't develop a habit of punching out naked women in
videogames.
Anna
